summary:
Turns light imperial armor and studded imperial armor into roman chainmail Lorica Hamata
(Male only at the moment)
descriptionHtml:
Every single person in the imperial legion is wearing leather (except for named people of course) More realistically, they'd be outfitted in chainmail much like most roman legionnaires. And also, roman leather armor was much darker than the bright brown in Default Skyrim.

Installation
-----------------------------------
Extract to Data

-----------------------------------
Uninstallation
-----------------------------------
Remove files: bootslight.dds, cuirasstrooper.dds, cuirasstrooper_n.dds, gauntletslight.dds, and helmetlight.dds from textures/armor/imperial/m/
author: falkenbergstorm
